name: Bronslaw
description:
Fight against oncoming zombie waves with your giant swords and magical powers.    With several different weapons with unique abilities, upgrade your character to your full potential, how long will you survive!?

-------------Controls------------

WASD, Click to use some custom weapons

Space to dash

Q for the next wave (make sure if there's a weapon option to choose that first)

TO select your upgrades use 1,2,3,4,5

----------Other-----------------

Game was made in less than a week.

Game by: RavoGames

Sounds from: FreeSound
